tool_description: The Coin Flip API allows users to simulate a coin toss by returning a random result of "heads" or "tails". This API is useful for applications that require a random decision to be made, such as games or simulations.
title: Coin Flip API

api_list.name: Coin Flip
api_list.description: The Coin Flip API allows users to simulate a coin toss by returning a random result of "heads" or "tails". This API is useful for applications that require a random decision to be made, such as games or simulations.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coin-flip-api.p.rapidapi.com/flipcoin"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coin-flip-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
